SokobanLevels.Title: SOKO-BONUS
SokobanLevels.Description: A single level originally distributed as sample with the freeware game"SOKO-BAN"produced by ZX-SOFT Brazil for the ZX-Spectrum, currentlyavailable at http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseekid.cgi?id=0017733This level can be freely distributed and/or used commercially providedit remains unchanged and the author is properly credited.
